description: This council has been asked for its observations on application submitted to Westminster City Council. (Ref No 19/05881/FULL) Erection of single storey front and rear extensions at lower ground floor level; lowering of existing floor finishing level of the lower ground level; infill light-well and extension at second floor level; conversion of garage into habitable space; demolition to garage to create new basement / Lower ground floor underneath, and ground floor extension; replacement of butterfly roof with mansard roof with dormers for windows and door; provision of Air conditioning condensers to main roof; demolition and construction of south and east elevation walls; replacement of rails at first, second and third floors with concrete parapet; removal of concrete bridge to garden; replacement of ground floor French door with sash windows; and associated works.
